verses.content: LALPA thu chu ka kuomah a hung tlung a,
“Mihriem naupa, Israel rama zâwlnei, anni lungrila inthawk ela thuhrillâwkhai hril hlaktuhai kuoma chun thu hril la, ‘LALPA thu chu lo ngai ta u,’ ti rawh.
LALPA chun hieng hin a tih: zâwlnei invêt, iengkhawm hmu si loa mâni ngaidân ngawt zâwmtu chu a chung a rik!
Aw Israel, i zâwlneihai chu hmun ṭâwpa sihalhai ang an ni tah a.
A âwnga chun in hang fe nawh a, LALPA nia indonaa ngîrna dingin Israel sûngkaw ta ding chun paldâi in siem bawk nawh a.
Anni chun teplo mei mei le vân tieng thil khêl thu an hmu a, LALPA- IN anni chu a tir naw sain, ‘LALPAIN a tih’ tiin an thu chu sukdet ni ngei dingin mihai an inbeiseitir a.
Keiin ka hril nawh a, ‘LALPA chun a hril a nih,’ in ti hin thilhmulâwk teplo chu in hmuin vântieng thil inkhêl chu in hril a ni nâwm a nih?” tiin.
Chuleiin, Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih: “Teplo mei mei in hril a, khêlhai chu in hmu leiin, ngai ta u, nangni chu ka dodâl cheu a nih. Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih.

Vântieng thukhêl le, zâwlnei teplo mei mei hmutuhai chunga chun ka kut chu um a ta; ka mihai in- khâwmnaa chun ṭhang ve naw ni hai a, Israel sûngkaw chanchin inziek- naa chun ziek ni bawk naw nih a; Israel rama chun lût bawk naw ni hai a; chun, Lalpa PATHIEN chu ka ni ti mi hre tâng in tih.
‘Inremna,’ tiin ka mihai chu an ṭhuoi suol a; inremna chu a um nawh a, chun, miin bang a siem lai chun, ngai ta, chirhak inhnâk loin an bel a;
chuong chirhak inhnâk loa beltuhai kuoma chun, a tla nâwk el ding a nih ti hril rawh, ruo a hrâta hrât hung sûr a ta, riel nasatak tlâng a ta, thlipui nasatakin nuoi a tih.
Ngai ta u, bang chu a tla pha chun in kuomah, ‘In ibelna chu khâwlai am a um leh?’ an ti naw ding cheu maw?
Chuleiin, Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih; Ka lunginsenin thlipui hrângin suksieng ka tih; ka lunginsennaa chun ruo a hrâta hrâta sûr um a ta, a sukbohmang ding lunginsena riel nasatak leh.

Chuongchun, bang chirhak in- hnâk loa in bel kha suksieng ka ta, hnuoiah hung la thlâng ka tih; chuongchun, a lung phûm chu inlang tâng a ta, tlûng a ta, chu sûnga chun sukbohmangin um in tih; chun, LALPA ka ni mi hre tâng in tih.
Chuong ang chun ka lungin- senna chu bang chunga le chirhak inhnâk loa beltuhai chunga chun sukpuitling ka ta; in kuoma chun, ‘Bang chu a um ta nawh a, a beltuhai khawm,’ tîng an tih.
Zâwlneihai Jerusalem chung- thu hrillâwktu le inremna um silo inremna dinga thilhmulâwk hmuhai chunga chun, Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih.
“Chun, nang mihriem naupa, an lungrila inthawka thu hriltuhai, i mihai naunuhai tieng chu ngha rawh; anni kalin thu hril la,

Lalpa PATHIEN chun, ‘Nu- hmei, kutrîng tina inbuntir ding ṭhuitu le, thlahai pêl dinga mi saput ieng ang po el lua dinga rawmawl siem chu a chung a rik de! a tih,’ ti rawh. Ka mihai thlahai chu pêlin nangni ta ding chauin thla chu in sandam ding maw?

Buṭei vei khat le bei hlek hmu dingin ka mihai lai chun, mi thi lo dinghai chu that ding le, mi hring lo dinghai chu sandam dingin, thu khêl ngai hlak ka mihai chu hlêmin, ka mihai lai chun i mi lo sukhmingsiet tah a.

Chuleiin, Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih, Ngai ta u, vate anga manna dinga in thil inbuntirhai chu ka dodâl a nih; in kuthaia inthawkin ka keithlêr ding a nih; in man tumhai chu infetir ka ta, vate anga in ipêlhai ngei chu.
In rawmawlhai chu keithlêr ka ta, ka mihai chu in kuta inthawkin sansuok ka tih; chun, pêl dingin in kuta chun um ta naw ni hai; chun, LALPA chu ka nih ti mi hre tâng in tih.
Mi fel lungril ka suklungngai naw chu thukhêla in suklungzîng tâk leiin mi rilo kuthai khawm in lo suk- hrât tah a, a lampui riloa inthawka a kîr nâwk nawna dingin hringna thu in tiem a;
chuleichun, teplo chu hmu nâwk ta naw ti niu a, vântieng thil- hmulâwkhai khawm chu; chun, ka mihai chu in kuta inthawkin sansuok ka ta, LALPA chu ka ni ti mi hre tâng in tih,” tiin.
